reviews.text: Great bar for tequila cocktails. Menu looks good. I was very happy with the customer service and decor.

After experiencing a terrible night at another restaurant we came straight to A√±ejo for a pallet cleanse.

They are always so friendly, accommodating and the food and drinks are amazing !
Our server was so nice and checked in on us constantly. We had the guacamole, fish tacos, lamb tacos and some flavored margaritas.
Once again everyone is so attentive not just our server but all staff is making sure you have what you need.
There isn‚Äôt much more to say except they are so great and it‚Äôs definitely one of my favorite restaurants, highly recommend! :)
In a post COVID NY of water down drinks and bad customer service, this place is a haven for catching up with friends
Charlie was amazing. Pls ask for him! Super attentive sweet and kind and gave great recommendations

What a charming spot! Busy no but not overcrowded, servers were attentive without being overbearing, excellent food and dangerously smooth A√±ejo margaritas. I look forward to coming back and trying more delicious meals here!

Decent but not exactly great. Small menu more mezcal and tequila than food options.
Cesar salad was interesting but not exactly great.
Jodi is the best of the best! I‚Äôm not here if she‚Äôs not here. She always guarantees my experience is the best of the best !!!!!ü©∑ü©∑ü©∑
